document.full_text: mr. craig surged to international attention in the 1970s as the leader of the ulster vanguard, a right-wing umbrella group for protestant partisans opposed to irish nationalism.
document.title: william craig, politician in northern ireland, is dead at 86
lines_and_colors: mr. craig surged to international attention in the 1970s as the leader of the ulster vanguard, a right-wing umbrella group for protestant partisans opposed to irish nationalism.
